Lines.Description: If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00000238
Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00000774
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00000748
Yield on  timer to  next line
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00000832
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00000916
If camera_x < Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001108
If camera_x > Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001188
If camera_y < Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00001268
If camera_y > Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00001348
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00001490
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00001648
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_up
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00001796
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_up
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00001970
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003060
Print 'Error: Level needs to be at least as tall as the current Y Resolution value {yres}' on quit
If Camera_XMin > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002384
If Camera_XMax > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002452
If Camera_YMin > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00002510
If Camera_YMax > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00002578
If Camera_XMin > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002698
If Camera_XMax > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002766
If Camera_YMin > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00002824
If Camera_YMax > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00002892
If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00002988
If music is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003122
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003212
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003268
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003364
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003516
If Test bit megadrive_start on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00003594
If Test bit cd32_play on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00003622
If true is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003768
If Test bit megadrive_start on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00003718
If Test bit cd32_play on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00003762
If music is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003996
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
If regeneratescreen is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004354
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004548
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
If ismegadrive is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004840
If IsNTSC is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004708
Print 'Y Resolution of 240 is not supported on NTSC Mega Drive' on quit
Print 'Y Resolution of {yres} is not supported on Mega Drive, only 224 (any) and 240 (pal)' on quit
If actor_x >= camera_x + XRes ELSE GOTO 00004962
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres ELSE GOTO 00005044
If panel is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005250
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005250
If panel_bottom is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005292
If panel_top is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005354
If control1_buttons is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005722
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00005892
If actor_x >= camera_x + xres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00006072
Print 'Thank you for playing' on quit
Say 'Don't go anywhere without your shield'

Say 'You found a sword!!!

You can now fight monsters.'
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00007472
Yield on  timer to  next line

Say 'You found a shield!!!

Your defence rises by one point.'

Say 'N: Link's Home
W: Hyrule Field
E: Forest Temple'
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00008900
Yield on  timer to  next line
Say 'The Kingdom of Hyrule has been in peace since Link, the last knight of Hyrule, had defeated the malicious Ganon and reclaimed the precious triforce from him.'
Say 'Nobody knows what Link's wish to the triforce was, but it had the effect of reunifying the Light and Dark world, and awakening the 7 wise men's descendants.'

Say 'Next, Link handed the Triforce and Master Sword over to Princess Zelda, and people started to believe that peace would last.<5>
But the people were wrong<3>.<3>.<3>.'
Say 'Unfortunately, Link's wish also had negative effects. Ganon and his henchmen were resurrected and got ready to attack.'

Say 'Somewhere in Hyrule Forest, Link is sleeping without suspecting that Ganon has already moved into attack.
<5>Until<3>.<3>.<3>.'
Yield on  timer to  next line
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00010114
Yield on  timer to  next line

Say 'Help me!<5>
Help me!<5>
It's me,<2> Zelda!<3>
I'm talking to you by telepathy.'
Say 'I am a prisoner in the dungeon of the castle!'
Say 'Ganon is back, and he surely has already found the Triforce<3>.<3>.<3>.'
Say 'Come quickly to the castle Link, you are my only hope<3>.<3>.<3>.'
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00010930
Yield on  timer to  next line
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00011028
Yield on  timer to  next line
